nodes.text: Telgorn Corporation was the manufacturer of a number of space stations and a large line of small transports around the time of the Galactic Civil War. They produced things for both the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

It is possible that Kost & Ko Factories entered a joint venture with the Telgorn Corporation over the design and manufacture of the X7 Deep Space Manufacturing Facility, or at least licensed the right to produce it to the larger company.
Furthermore, the similarity in design of the XQ Platform series indicates a strong degree of cooperation between Telgorn, Bengel Shipbuilders and Xizor Transport Systems.
